Subject: An offer is in!

Dear Darron Giron,

Congratulations on having 4 lenders competing for your business. Your
decision to make a loan request through LendingTree has really paid off
and now you are in a great position to choose the offer that's best for
you.

iwayloan.com Inc. has responded to your loan request. You can see all
the details of your offer by visiting
http://www.lendingtree.com/new/statuslogin.asp Simply enter your email
address and password to retrieve your loan offer.

If one of your responses is good, but not good enough, feel free to
contact the lender directly--you have the power to get the best deal
through LendingTree.


As your personal customer care advocate, I am dedicated to helping you
find the best loan for your needs. If either myself or one of my
customer care teammates can help you at any time during the process,
please reply to this email or call us 1-888-272-1355 Monday through
Friday 8:30am-9pm EST and Saturday 8:30am-8pm EST.

Thank you for using LendingTree...When Banks Compete, You Win.

Bobbi Green
Director of Customer Care
LendingTree, Inc.
